historyItem.sql: SELECT SUBSTR(a. reserv_date,1,6) as 매출월 ,SUM(DECODE (b.item_id,'M0001',B.SALES,0)) AS SPECIAL_SET ,SUM(DECODE (b.item_id,'M0001',B.SALES,0)) AS SPECIAL_SET ,SUM(DECODE (b.item_id,'M0001',B.SALES,0)) AS SPECIAL_SET ,SUM(DECODE (b.item_id,'M0001',B.SALES,0)) AS SPECIAL_SET ,SUM(DECODE (b.item_id,'M0001',B.SALES,0)) AS SPECIAL_SET ,SUM(DECODE (b.item_id,'M0001',B.SALES,0)) AS SPECIAL_SET ,SUM(DECODE (b.item_id,'M0001',B.SALES,0)) AS SPECIAL_SET ,SUM(DECODE (b.item_id,'M0001',B.SALES,0)) AS SPECIAL_SET ,SUM(DECODE (b.item_id,'M0001',B.SALES,0)) AS SPECIAL_SET FROM reservation a ,order_info b where a.reserv_no = b.reserv_no GROUP BY SUBSTR(a. reserv_date,1,6) ORDER BY 1;
